# Function Controls

Each of the function (Fn, Q, and AEL/AFL) buttons and touch-function (T-Fn1, T-Fn2, T-Fn3, and T-Fn4) button flick gestures can be assigned its own role.

## The Function Buttons

Assign roles to the function (Fn, Q, and AEL/AFL) buttons for quick access.

### Function Button Defaults

The default assignments are:

!Camera Function Buttons

| Function Buttons          | Default        |
|---------------------------|----------------|
| ① Q (quick menu) button   | QUICK MENU     |
| ② Fn button               | WHITE BALANCE  |
| ③ AEL/AFL button          | AE/AF LOCK     |
